game.name: Bustories
game.shortDescription: A small visual novel about bus trips and conversation with different companions, whom you see for the first and last time in your life.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A small visual novel about bus trips and conversation with different companions, whom you see for the first and last time in your life.

reviewHighlights.text: Every person has their own life story and you never know who you might meet in life. I think that's what the developer of this game wants to tell us....
